name: Pixelated Laokoön Group
description:
Laokoon(Λαοκόων) was a priest to Apollo. When Troians saw the Achaeans fall back, they elected Laokoon to pray and gave sacrifices to Posedion due to Achaean fleet supremacy to fall. They want storms fall loose on them. Laokoon and his sons Ethron and Melanthoos were on the beach ready to sacrifice a big bull. When Laokoon was about to sacrifice the bull, two enormous snakes came up from the sea and attacked his sons. Laokoon strides and helps his sons but they have  suffocated by snakes on that beach. Thousand years later, these names was sculpted by Pergamene sculpture school. 


These pieces of stone may one day completely disappear and be destroyed. However, these pixels they leave behind will not be changed for life and will be carried to the next generations.
